summary: A racemenu preset of Casca from Berserk, made with Ningheim race
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]Here's a preset of one of my favorite characters from Berserk, Casca

[/size][size=3](She's made accordingly to her pre-eclipse version but
[/size][size=3] with a little switch of hairstyle you can easily 
give her her post-eclipse look)

[u][size=4]Mods required[/size] [/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] 
  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race
<br />[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55364/?]Kijiko Hair[/url]

[/size][size=4][u]Installation:
[/u][/size][size=3]Extract the preset into: TSEV Skyrim LE\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets
press "Tab"
type "racemenu"
go to "presets" 
press "F9"
Select "Casca" 

[/size][size=4][u]Credits:[/u]
expired6978 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] 
Seren4XX for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race[/url] 
goldiocks for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55364/?]Kijiko Hair
[/url]zzjay for [url=http://mylink.com][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/?]zzjay's wardrobe[/url] (armor)

[u]Note:
[/u][/size]Her skin/eyes/brows etc are included within The Ningheim Race (skin version 1)

[size=5]Enjoy :)[/size][/center]
author: evilia3
